name: Grilled and Peppered Snail
aboutDish: We bring back a favorite family: Grilled and Peppered Snail! It is an extra-large serving of protein food. That is enough for dinner tonight—and maybe even a wonderful appetizer while you are going to bed.

name: Oven Dried Snail
aboutDish: The oven dried snail provides sufficient satisfaction to the body and mouth. It keeps the chin going for a certain amount of time and releases the sugar from the sky into the lungs.

name: Fresh Snail
aboutDish: Fresh, clean and parboiled snail is available through us. This offers the chance to prepare the snail in your own preferred manner and procedure.

name: Live Snail
aboutDish: We bring back a favorite family: Grilled and Peppered Snail! It is an extra-large serving of protein food. That is enough for dinner tonight—and maybe even a wonderful appetizer while you are going to bed.
